noResidentsDescription: There are currently no residents in the system. Click below to add your first resident!
importDescription: Import residents from a CSV file. Download the sample file to see the required format.
downloadTemplateDescription: Download a sample CSV file with the correct format. Use this as a template for your import file.
uploadCsvDescription: Select a CSV file containing resident data. The file should follow the format shown in the sample file.

importDialog.title: Import Residents
importDialog.description: Import residents from a CSV file. Download the sample file to see the required format.

uploadSection.title: Upload CSV File
uploadSection.description: Select a CSV file containing resident data. The file should follow the format shown in the sample file.

sampleSection.title: Sample File
sampleSection.description: Download a sample CSV file with the correct format. Use this as a template for your import file.

filters.moreFiltersDescription: Apply additional filters to refine your resident list.

dialogs.addNewResidentDescription: Fill in the details to add a new resident to your community.
dialogs.editResidentDescription: Update the resident's information and preferences.
dialogs.deleteResidentDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this resident? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteSelectedResidentsDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the selected residents? This action cannot be undone.

forms.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional notes about the resident

errors.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.createResidentError: Failed to create resident. Please try again.
errors.updateResidentError: Failed to update resident. Please try again.
errors.bulkActionError: Please select at least one resident to perform this action.
errors.exportError: Please select at least one resident to export.
errors.importError: Error importing residents. Please check the file format and try again.
errors.processingError: Error processing file. Please check the format and try again.
errors.headerOrderError: CSV header order does not match the required import format. Please use the sample file as a template.
errors.missingRequiredFields: Missing required fields (name or birth date)
errors.cannotDeleteWithSessions: Cannot delete a resident with at least one session.
errors.invalidPhoneNumberDescription: Phone number must be either 10 digits starting with 05 or 9 digits starting with 02, 03, 04, 08, or 09
errors.invalidFullNameDescription: Full name can only contain English letters, Hebrew letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
errors.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.fullNameInvalid: Full name can only contain English letters, Hebrew letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
errors.invalidBirthDateDescription: Please enter a valid birth date within the acceptable range
errors.birthDateInvalid: Please enter a valid birth date
errors.birthDateTooOld: Birth year must be 1900 or later
errors.birthDateTooYoung: Person must be at least 16 years old
errors.birthDateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future

validation.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number must be either 10 digits starting with 05 or 9 digits starting with 02, 03, 04, 08, or 09
